name: commits_per_branch
description: Tracks the number of commits per branch in the repository.

dimensions.name: branch_name
dimensions.description: The name of the branch in the repository.

measures.name: commit_count
measures.description: The total number of commits in a branch.

sample_questions: How many commits are there per branch?
List the branches with the most commits.
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT branch_name, COUNT(commits.commits.oid) AS commit_count FROM commits.commits GROUP BY branch_name
